WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I was using WPFToolkit  dll version 3.5.40128 with my project that is on dotnet framework 4.0. Till that time my grid id working fine. but recently i upgraded the project version from 4.0 to 4.5.2 and after that my grid is not behaving properly.


Narendra Sengar
WorkItem.Summary: Is WpfToolKit version 3.5.40128 is compatible for 4.5.2 VS project
